17 void RealsenseL515::capturePointcloud(const tf::StampedTransform& transform)
18 {
19  PRINT_METHOD();
20 
21  // wait for new pointcloud on topic
22  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2::ConstPtr pc_msg = ros::topic::waitForMessage<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2>(PC_TOPIC);
23 
24  // convert ros msg to pcl pointcloud
25  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr pc(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>());
26  pcl::fromROSMsg(*pc_msg, *pc);
27 
28  // extract area of interest from pointcloud
29  extractPointcloud(pc);
30 
31  // transform pointcloud (e.g. to world frame)
32  pcl_ros::transformPointCloud(*pc, *pc, transform);
33 
34  // filter pointcloud
35  filterPointcloud(pc);
36 
37  // save pointcloud
38  clouds_.push_back(pc);
39 }

41 void RealsenseL515::fusePointclouds()
42 {
43  PRINT_METHOD();
44 
45  // abort if no pointclouds
46  if (clouds_.empty()) {
47  return;
48  }
49 
50  // add all pointclouds together
51  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr pc(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>());
52  for (const pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud : clouds_) {
53  *pc = *pc + *cloud;
54  }
55 
56 #ifdef SIMULATION
57  thinOutPointcloud(0.005f, 0.005f, 0.005f, pc);
58 #endif
59 
60  // return pointcloud as ros msg
61  pcl::toROSMsg(*pc, pc_);
62 }

85 void RealsenseL515::savePointclouds() const
86 {
87  PRINT_METHOD();
88 
89  // for debugging
90 
91  // save individual pointclouds
92  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr pc(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>());
93  for (size_t i = 0; i < clouds_.size(); ++i) {
94  pcl::io::savePCDFileASCII("cloud_" + std::to_string(i) + ".pcd", *clouds_[i]);
95  *pc = *pc + *clouds_[i];
96  }
97 
98  // save fused pointcloud
99  pcl::io::savePCDFileASCII("cloud_fused.pcd", *pc);
100 }

102 void RealsenseL515::extractPointcloud(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr pc) const
103 {
104  PRINT_METHOD();
105 
106  // extract area of interest from pointcloud
107  pcl::PointIndices::Ptr to_remove(new pcl::PointIndices());
108  pcl::ExtractIndices<pcl::PointXYZ> extract;
109  for (int i = 0; i < pc->size(); i++) {
110  if (pc->points[i].x > 0.21 || pc->points[i].x < -0.21 || pc->points[i].y > 0.21 || pc->points[i].y < -0.21 || !std::isfinite(pc->points[i].x) || !std::isfinite(pc->points[i].y) || !std::isfinite(pc->points[i].z)) {
111  to_remove->indices.push_back(i);
112  }
113  }
114  if (!to_remove->indices.empty()) {
115  extract.setInputCloud(pc);
116  extract.setIndices(to_remove);
117  extract.setNegative(true);
118  extract.filter(*pc);
119  }
120 }
121 
122 void RealsenseL515::filterPointcloud(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr pc) const
123 {
124  PRINT_METHOD();
125 
126  // remove unwanted parts of the pointcloud
127  pcl::PointIndices::Ptr to_remove(new pcl::PointIndices());
128  pcl::ExtractIndices<pcl::PointXYZ> extract;
129  for (int i = 0; i < pc->size(); i++) {
130  if (pc->points[i].z < -0.03 || !std::isfinite(pc->points[i].x) || !std::isfinite(pc->points[i].y) || !std::isfinite(pc->points[i].z)) {
131  to_remove->indices.push_back(i);
132  }
133  }
134  if (!to_remove->indices.empty()) {
135  extract.setInputCloud(pc);
136  extract.setIndices(to_remove);
137  extract.setNegative(true);
138  extract.filter(*pc);
139  }
140

142  // filter.setInputCloud(pc);
143  // filter.setMeanK(20);
144  // filter.setStddevMulThresh(1.0);

148 void RealsenseL515::thinOutPointcloud(const float x, const float y, const float z, pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr pc) const
149 {
150  PRINT_METHOD();
151 
152  pcl::VoxelGrid<pcl::PointXYZ> grid;
153 
154  grid.setInputCloud(pc);
155  grid.setLeafSize(x, y, z);
156  grid.filter(*pc);
157 }
